backend/main.mo: Primary backend actor defining all core types for incidents, messages, evidence, summaries, police submissions, and integrations with authorization, storage, and migration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that keeps actor state unchanged by returning the old state directly.
backend/police-department.mo: Defines the PoliceDepartment type with basic contact and address fields.
backend/stalker-profile.mo: Defines the StalkerProfile type including personal, location, and vehicle details.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file linking a DV Journal cache-invalidation fix to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme variables and light/dark mode palettes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA metadata, icons, theming, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling precaching, runtime caching, activation cleanup, fetch strategies, and skip-waiting messages.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, profile setup flow, quick-exit shortcut, theming, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsDashboa: Empty component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/CrimeHelp.tsx: Presents educational cards on legal rights, crime definitions, and external resources for women's safety. Includes UI elements, icons, and a link to womenslaw.org.
frontend/src/components/DVJournalSection: Manages DV journal entries, abuser name, risk detection, and analysis using multiple queries and mutations. Provides UI for editing, adding entries, viewing risk, and handling stalker profiles.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution, a heart icon, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with branding, authentication controls, theme toggle, and quick‑exit behavior. Integrates user profile data and identity login logic.
frontend/src/components/ImmediateHelpSaf: Shows emergency contact options, safety warnings, and hotline links using cards and alerts. Provides tap‑to‑call buttons for 911, DV hotline, and crisis text resources.
frontend/src/components/IncidentDetail.t: Displays detailed incident data including messages, evidence, stalker info, and nearest police department. Supports message generation, police report dialog, and department selection with auto‑refresh.
frontend/src/components/IncidentForm.tsx: Form component for creating incidents with validation, file uploads, and optional linking to a stalker profile.
Displays the user’s past incidents with loading, error, and detail view handling.
frontend/src/components/InstallationGuid: Provides step-by-step PWA installation instructions and shareable app links.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveSumma: Generates and displays an AI‑compiled summary of all incidents with tone analysis and metadata.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Landing/login screen prompting users to authenticate via Internet Identity and showcasing app features.
frontend/src/components/MainContent.tsx: Main tabbed dashboard managing user profile, incident creation, navigation, and section rendering.
frontend/src/components/MaleUserWarningM: Empty placeholder component with no content.
frontend/src/components/MessageGenerator: UI for generating incident‑based messages, allowing users to select tone and intensity and submit generation requests.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Displays generated messages with copy, share, and SMS options, including tone and intensity labeling.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalVide: Empty placeholder component with no content.
frontend/src/components/PoliceReportDial: Dialog for assembling and submitting a police report with selected evidence, victim info, and incident narrative.
frontend/src/components/PoliceSubmission: Displays a user's police submission logs with status, evidence details, and error/loading states. Includes formatting utilities for dates, file types, and file sizes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDeleteCon: Provides a confirmation dialog for deleting a saved profile with async handling and disabled states during deletion.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Allows users to create a profile by submitting their name, with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Handles showing and managing a PWA installation prompt with iOS and reinstall logic.
frontend/src/components/QuickExitSetting: Lets users configure and save a custom Quick Exit URL with validation, reset functionality, and feedback alerts.
frontend/src/components/SavedStalkerProf: Manages viewing, editing, loading, and deleting saved stalker profiles using dialogs and async mutations.
frontend/src/components/StalkerRecord.ts: Provides a full interface for managing current stalker info, adding profiles, and handling police department data with tabs, forms, and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/components/VictimProfile.ts: React component for viewing and editing optional victim profile fields with save functionality and form state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReadiness.ts: Derives readiness, initialization, and error state for the backend actor based on React Query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useDVJournalQueries.t: Provides React Query hooks for DV journal operations including reading, writing, permission checks, and actor readiness handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, stored identities, and context access for the app.
Custom hook that syncs React state with localStorage for persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Detects PWA install availability, platform conditions, and provides a prompt handler for installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, incidents, stalker data, victim profiles, and related backend interactions with actor readiness checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark mode, and custom utility classes including gradients and red chat styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types.ts: Re-exports shared backend types and enums for consistent frontend typing.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitErrorMessage: Maps various actor initialization and network errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/highRiskKeywords.ts: Defines high‑risk keywords and utilities to detect them in text.
Normalizes timestamps across units and formats them safely into readable dates.
frontend/src/utils/quickExit.ts: Manages quick-exit URL validation, storage, and immediate redirect behavior.
frontend/src/utils/shareLink.ts: Provides helpers to get share URLs, copy text, and use the Web Share API with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URL and session storage logic.
frontend/src/utils/waitForActorReady.ts: Waits for actor queries in React Query to finish initializing before use, with timeout handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, custom colors from CSS variables, breakpoints, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and state, listing issues with DV journal abuser name persistence and outlines existing and new feature requests to fix backend and frontend behavior.
